name: Tomhas Advisory Limited
goal:
The main goas of Tomhas Advisory Limited is to provide advice and assistance to companies involved in development projects
Tomhas Advisory Limited assists companies in developing strategic partnerships for large scale projects at a National , Europen and Global Level
Tomhas Advisory Limited also provides policy and curriculum advice to Educational Institutions on course provision to students
interests: Climate Action, Culture, Education, Energy, Environment, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Energy
Integration of Europe's Energy Markets and diversification of sources
Projects of Common Interest
